WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
I load an XLSX file (temp.xslx) with autofilter on line 2.
I filter A column with '1' value.
Funnel icon is visible on A2 cell.
I write this file into output.xlsx.
Funnel icon is lost and I have only one chosse if I click on A2 cell.
2 values ('1' and '10') are wished.
Could you correct it please ?
Thanks.
WorkItem.Summary: Funnel icon is not saved on autofilter

Comments.Message: The funnel icon indicates that there is an "active" filter on the filter column. Currently PHPExcel does supports setting filterable columns, but doesn't yet support setting an active filter, although it does still recognise the rows hidden by an active filter as hidden. This is on the TO DO list: while creating this feature is fairly straightforward, there is a noticeable performance overhead, and I'd prefer to work out a method of implementing this that doesn't take an excessive time to execute.

Thank you for your answer.
I'll wait for this feature
